pageContext.claim: “Do not believe any article or story you read or see that uses ‘anonymous sources’ having to do with trade or any other subject. Only accept information if it has an actual living name on it. The Fake News Media makes up many ‘sources say’ stories. Do not believe them!”
pageContext.analysis: This is disingenuous. The White House, the State Department and the Pentagon often provide background briefings to reporters on condition that the names of officials not be disclosed. Trump himself famously has been an unidentified source for reporters. He even tweeted about information he's received from undentified sources.
